sense.name: waterway
sense.commentary: sound - a narrow channel of the sea joining two larger bodies of water
sense.examples: The Torres Strait area is inhabited by aboriginal tribes. The Strait of Gibraltar is between Africa and Europe.

sense.name: bad situation
sense.commentary: pass, straits - a bad or difficult situation or state of affairs
sense.examples: John was in dire straits when Mary reminded him of the upcoming deadline .
